author: lgo
msg: Convert ssl logging to the new config system. To make this work, call set_config
directly after creating a bucket systematically, both in the context handling
code as in the bucket code (for nested buckets).
(create_chunk): Set_config on the nested bucket after creation.
ssl_need_client_cert): Convert serf__log to serf__log_cfg. This has as
consequence that the ssl log lines will now have local and remote ip.
(do_conn_setup): Set_config before using the stream buckets.

author: lgo
msg: Follow up to r2203, value returned by serf_get_config_string is now a const *.

author: lgo
msg: (CuAssertPtrEquals_LineMsg): Make expected and actual pointers const. This

author: lgo
msg: Start making logging use the config objects.
serf_log_wrapped_read): Switch from serf__log_skt to serf__log_cfg.
(serf_set_config_stringf): New helper function, formats string directly in the
serf_connection_close): Switch from serf__log_skt to serf__log_cfg.
(store_ipaddresses_in_config): New helper function, stores local and remote
ip addresses in string format in the configuration.
(serf__open_connections): Switch from serf__log_skt to serf__log_cfg. Use

author: lgo
msg: Make serf_get_config_from_store a private function, application should not get
